channel.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
channel.description:
Add, take out, replace or switch a character's position on a game's title and then write a short description about what is it about now.
-----
Splinter Sell - In this exhilarating prequel to Splinter Cell Conviction, Sam Fisher needs to sell his collection of rare wood splinters in order to fund his rogue agent life and find out who killed his daughter.
Metal Rage Rising - Experience the life of a metalhead who falls deep into the ranks of a hate group that wants to topple the government.

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Putlast.

A children’s strategy game in which you have to put things in order from last to first.

Read full topic
item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Fnork:

The Bongest Journey - Teenager April Ryan has to cross worlds and walk like a really long way to get some damn munchies, man

Best one I’ve seen in this thread. You, Fnork, win the internet.

The First of Us - The player is the first to settle on an uninhabited world, and must work to make a small living space, food supply, and a landing area to permit further settlers to arrive. Not all is as it seems…

Read full topic
item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: Tiki
item.description:
Fear Esther - The memory of an abusive spouse haunts a delusional old man. No matter where he runs, her phantom will chase him.

Read full topic
item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Rice of the Tomb Raider - Explore the most dangerous places in the world in your quest to find the perfect rice for your dinner date.

item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: Tiki
item.description:
I encounter the year 2038 problem in MS Excel. That game System Clock is so plausible IRL that it’s scary.

Read full topic
item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: Dreadmoth
item.description:
Legend of Grimlock - as a party of 1 - 4 Dinobots, escape a labyrinthine Decepticon prison in this grid-based first-person action-RPG

System Clock - after accidentally being rolled back to an older build, a military artificial intelligence encounters the Year 2038 Problem and goes haywire, deciding the world must be reverted to the state it was in on 13th December 1901. Battle hordes of robots and crazy people, then try turning that computer off (but not on again) ¯_(ツ)_/¯

Read full topic
item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
Black Cerveza - As Donal Trump, your being elected president failed to resonate with the minorities and a cascade of illegal aliens are attacking the white(only) house.
run, shoot, live.

Read full topic
item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Zone of the Benders- Barhopping simulator where you seek to get yourself as wasted as possible without passing out and visiting as many different bars as possible. Also, you occasionally hallucinate young children piloting gigantic mecha.

Allen: Isolation - You work on a starship by yourself as a mechanic, fittingly named Alan. Get everything fixed up and try not to go stir-crazy.

Watch Cats - Pet supervision simulator. Features a working smartphone and a text-driven series of subplots.

Read full topic
item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
The Hitcher - Hitch rides through all of eastern europe and Siberia, drink lots of vodka and squat in your adidas tracksuit while waiting for a ride.

Read full topic
item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Meta Man - Side-scrolling self-referential platformer, shooting down all the conventions of side-scrolling platformers.

Read full topic
item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: Tiki
item.description:
The Talon Principle - Control the alpha-male (or alpha-female) of a pack of reanimated velociraptors which escape from a mad-scientist’s menagerie. You must survive by tackling easy prey until the opportunity for revenge presents itself. But watch out, guards and fellow specimens might also be hunting you!

Risk of Pain - This epic action-sidescroller-bullet hell is renowned not only for having no save-mechanism, but also features one-hit death.

Mace Engineers - Develop melee weapons to be used in gladiatorial combat. Iteratively learn how to design weapons to overcome armor, stagger foes, and not injure the hands which wield them. (Challenge your friends’ designs in new head-to-head mode.)

Undertail - Have you ever wanted to play a dating simulator featuring human-livestock relations, but found your options scarce? Well look no further! Features 16 beasts of burden to choose from.

Read full topic
item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: wayne_acoba
item.description:
Limbo - How far down can you get, before your bottom hits the ground?

Read full topic
item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Tragic: The Gathering - trading card game not too dissimilar to Magic: The Gathering, except the characters are the people playing the game.

Banhammer 40,000 - Assemble and paint miniature sculptures of forum administrators, moderators, regular users, and trolls, though no one is exactly sure who’s who on either side, and they battle it out on a forum. The moderators try to not raise the ire of the administrators by banning the wrong person, and so forth.

Read full topic
item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: Dreadmoth
item.description:
Zorrowind - as the legendary Zorro reborn as a Dunmer, you face a difficult choice: will you guard your new people against Imperial oppression, or work with the outlanders to eliminate slavery…?

Baldur’s Late - the famous adventurer Balduran has not returned from his latest voyage. As a member of the Flaming Fist Mercenary Company, lead an expedition to discover his fate…

Read full topic
item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: Massey
item.description:
Charted - Play as esteemed adventurer and treasure hunter Nathan Drake as he explores already discovered locations and interacts with the friendly locals.

Baggin’ Age 2 - The sequel to Baggin Age all the fans are raving about, follow a character of your creation on a journey to get a low wage job as a bag boy at a local super market.

Read full topic
item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Paper, please - Experience the awkward moment of using a public toilet and realizing that it ran out of toilet paper.

Hotline Mami - After losing her job due to the economy, Maria Dolorez comes to the conclusion that a sex hotline is the only way to make a steady income.

Read full topic
item.source: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Moat Simulator - Design moats for castles to defend from the incoming hoards. Time-limit mode available.

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: Dr_Perky
item.description:
Bar Fly 3 - an open world romp where you play a drunken man and must climb radio towers to locate the next bar in the hopes you won’t be thrown out this time.

Alan’s Baked - Alan gets baked and wanders around Twin Peaks.

Read full topic

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Assassin’s Breed - Breed and train attack dogs to help you in your contract assassination career.

Bran Turismo - Travel all over the world in search of the best types of bran to help you in your diet.

Read full topic

item.title: Make a small change to a game's title - what is it about now?
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
Dreadmoth:

Car Fry - open-world driving/cooking simulator in which you drive between isolated outposts on a tropical island to prepare delicious freshly-fried food for the inhabitants. Occasionally involves fighting off wild animals and crazed mutants…

I would play this

Read full topic

item.description:
Left 4 Dread. Your friends have left you for Dread, evil ruler of the multi-verses. Now you must liberate 4 of these universes to escape his clutches.
